Chapter Previous Next

enum GOBLIN_MSG

Goblin Messages.
GM_NULL=0x00000000
GM_CREATE=0x00000001
GM_DESTROY=0x00000002
GM_MOVE=0x00000003
GM_SIZE=0x00000005
GM_ACTIVATE=0x00000006
GM_DRAW=0x00000010
Draw the object.
GM_PROCESS=0x00000011
GM_ADDED=0x00000012
GM_REMOVED=0x00000013
GM_LBDOWN=0x00000020
Mouse left click down.
GM_LBUP=0x00000021
Mouse left release.
GM_RBDOWN=0x00000022
Mouse right click down.
GM_RBUP=0x00000023
Mouse right release.
GM_MBDOWN=0x00000024
Mouse middle click down.
GM_MBUP=0x00000025
Mouse middle release.
GM_DCLICK=0x00000026
Double click.
GM_MOUSEMOVE=0x00000027
Mouse movement happening.
GM_GOTMOUSE=0x00000028
Mouse on top of object.
GM_LOSTMOUSE=0x00000029
Mouse moved away from object.
GM_KEY=0x00000040
Keyboard shortcut.
GM_CHAR=0x00000041
Other keyboard input.
GM_UCHAR=0x00000042
Unicode keyboard input.
GM_XCHAR=0x00000043
Broadcast character to all objects.
GM_WANTFOCUS=0x00000050
Does object want the input focus?
GM_GOTFOCUS=0x00000051
Got the input focus.
GM_LOSTFOCUS=0x00000052
Lost the input focus.
GM_IDLE=0x00000080
Update any background stuff.
GM_SYSTEM=0x00001000
System wide message.
GM_USER=0x00004000
From here on are free...
From here on are free...

#include "gobdefs.h"
